question: What is the official administrative role of the city of Hail in Saudi Arabia?
true_answer: Hail is the administrative and regional capital of the Hail region in Saudi Arabia.
asked_question_translated: Was ist die offizielle Verwaltungsfunktion der Stadt Hail in Saudi-Arabien?
answer: Hail ist die Hauptstadt der gleichnamigen Provinz Hail in Saudi-Arabien und dient als deren Verwaltungszentrum.
answer_translated_eng: Hail is the capital of the province of the same name in Saudi Arabia and serves as its administrative centre.
